article_node.title: Fed Governor Lisa Cook 'did not ever commit mortgage fraud,' attorneys say
article_node.summary: Lisa Cook's attorneys deny mortgage fraud allegations and argue that President Trump lacks the authority to remove her from the Federal Reserve. They claim Cook was denied due process and that the alleged inconsistencies were disclosed during her confirmation. Trump has been pressuring the Fed to lower rates, but the Fed remains steady, with Fed Chair Jerome Powell hinting at a potential 25‑basis‑point cut in September.
